author: garvitaa
body:
#### PR description:
To study the impact of EE leak on jets we wish to monitor the purity and reconstruction efficiency of jets. This update allows the PF validation package to produce these additional plots for comparison.

#### PR validation:

title: Adding jet purity and efficiency plots to PFValidation package
